annotations.description: This is what football should look like. Full of action, thrilling moments and spectacular opportunities. The expectations for the next games will be high. Barcelona were dominant and more threatening of the two sides. It was a fairly one sided match. The strategy of the home side was to control the pace of the match with possession style football. Whereas the strategy of the away side was a bit risky and reliant on solid defending to dispossess the opponent and break fast.

Not a lot happening in the first half, it hasn't been the best game so far in terms of quality. It was a fairly one sided opening 45 minutes, with Barcelona much the better side better so far. The home side display their usual fluent passing, while the visitors use their organization to stop the build up and launch counter attacks.
